testcase.name: Perform item creation with valid details

Runner class : JUnitRunner -- listing properties -- msinventory-item_request=/src/test/java/msinventory/common/ite... msinventory-service_url=https://localhost:7050/api msinventory-item_api=/Item
@Item Scenario: Perform item creation with valid details # src/test/java/msinventory/features/crearitem.feature:4 Given an item with valid details # msinventory.steps.MSInventorySteps.getItemValidData(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | itemName | | empanadas | 11:55:27.447 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Request method: POST 11:55:27.450 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Request URI: https://localhost:7050/api/Item 11:55:27.450 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Proxy: <none> 11:55:27.450 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Request params: <none> 11:55:27.450 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Query params: <none> 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Form params: <none> 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Path params: <none> 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Headers: Accept=application/json, application/javascript, text/javascript, text/json 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Content-Type=application/json 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Cookies: <none> 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Multiparts: <none> 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Body: 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - { 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - "itemName": "empanadas", 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - "id": "b9917a25-760f-4ed1-9ed8-9a63240d2065" 11:55:27.451 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - } 11:55:27.907 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - HTTP/1.1 200 OK 11:55:27.907 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8 11:55:27.907 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Date: Sat, 25 Jan 2025 15:55:27 GMT 11:55:27.907 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Server: Kestrel 11:55:27.907 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - Transfer-Encoding: chunked 11:55:27.907 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - 11:55:27.907 [main] ERROR util.RequestSpecificationFactory - "b9917a25-760f-4ed1-9ed8-9a63240d2065" When request is submitted for item creation # msinventory.steps.MSInventorySteps.submitItemCreation() Then verify that the Item HTTP response is 200 # msinventory.steps.MSInventorySteps.verifyHTTPResponseCode(java.lang.Integer) And a item id is returned # msinventory.steps.MSInventorySteps.checkItemId()
